front.title: Specification of an Adaptation Function Between Two Multicast Networks Supporting Different IP Versions

abstract.t: In some transitional multicast scenarios, the multicast signalling and content have to pass across network boundaries where one network supports IPv4, the other, IPv6. An adaptation function is required at the boundary to support such a scenario. This memo uses the term "Type 2 Adaptation Function" (AF2) for such a function.
